title: Ep. 242 - The Mueller Report Is Here And The Goal Posts Are Magically Shifting
description:
The Mueller report is finally here. Nobody has read the whole thing. Why are we talking about it? Well I think there are a few basic takeaways we can already ascertain, and not ones the Left will like. Also, why are socialists like Bernie Sanders so stingy with charitable giving? And should teachers physically intervene when students fight? One teacher is getting flak for not intervening in a fight caught on camera. I'll explain why the criticisms are likely unfair. Date: 04-18-2019
